transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello, Narendra ji se Suresh Narendra ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Very good afternoon sir, Sunil baat kar raha hun IndiaMART ke behalf mein.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Ji aapki side se nahi gaya tha customer care pe Savita ji ke sath aapka discussion hua buyleads ko leke kuch issues aa rahe the.
Customer: Bilkul.
Customer: Bahut jyada issues hain sir, kyunki lead aa nahi raha hai bilkul.
Executive: Buyleads jo aapke paas aa rahi hai uska flow kaafi kam hai, unhone aisa bataya. Buyleads major point. Yahan pe na sir jo buyleads generate hota hai na wo depend karta hai ki aapke catalog ke andar kaun kaun si category lagi hui hai, okay?
Customer: Haan, category ke behalf mein. To abhi main jo conjunction dekh raha hun sabse jyada aapka water chillers ko leke. Water chillers jo hota hai us pe aap achcha kaam matlab business majorly karte hain hum log.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? Aur uske andar teen tarike ki category hoti hai. Hamare paas stainless steel water chillers hoga aapke paas?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ek hota hai centrifugal chillers karke.
Customer: Centrifugal chillers, haan.
Executive: Yes, ye bhi hoga aapke paas?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai, ek hota hai apna laboratory bhi water chillers karke.
Customer: Laboratory, haan, wo bhi hai.
Executive: Theek hai, in teeno categories ki isme ek category aapka main map kar de raha hun. Uske alawa jo major hai aapka second jo category dikh raha hai wo industrial water chillers karke hai sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai, isme mapping ho rakhi hai. Chiller maintenance services bhi hum log provide karte hain?
Customer: Haan, chiller ki maintenance bhi karte hain hum log.
Executive: Achcha chillers ko leke jitna bhi apna category product hoga sara aapke paas available hai, correct sir?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan, bilkul.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm. To yahan se chillers ko leke cooling towers ho gaya, air cooled chillers ho gaya, water cooled chillers ho gaya, steel plants bhi hum log dete hain iska bhi mapping hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To mostly jo bhi categories sir aapke catalog ya product se jo match kar rahi hai wo sari ki sari yahan pe map hain. To in categories pe agar jaise hi koi buyleads yani buyer jab IndiaMART ko bolega ki mujhe in categories ke andar kisi bhi chillers ki requirement hai, that time IndiaMART kya karegi na aapko uska lead share kar degi sir ki ye buyer hai jisne yahan se requirement dala hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai, ab yahan pe hota kya hai na ek buylead pe na only for chhe suppliers hi contact buyer now pe click kar sakte hain, paanch se chhe suppliers sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To kai baar kya hota hai na ki jaise suppose agar water chillers ki baat kare to market mein competition bahut hai sir aapko bhi pata hai ki aap Ghaziabad aur UP ke hi rehne wale ho to aapko pata hai ki apne local level pe kaafi sare suppliers is product mein kaam karte hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: But kharidne wale bahut limited hai kyunki unique product hai har koi to kharid nahi sakta sir isko.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Ab jitna bhi buylead aa raha hai wo kuch hi time mein pehli baat to expire ho ja raha hai iska reason hai ki us buylead pe only for paanch se chhe supplier hi kaam karte hain to maybe kabhi kabhi hamare ko us buylead nahi mil pata dusre supplier consume kar lete hain. Kuch aise buylead hoti hai jo hume milti hai.
Customer: Nahi abhi jab pehle na ye koi limit nahi tha IndiaMART ke andar ki paanch ya chhe log kar payenge tab to achchi lead aati thi lekin jab se ye aap log kiye hain na ki paanch chhe log hi kharid sakte hain ek lead ko tab se hum log jaise TrustSeal hai bada dikkat aa raha hai. To agar is tarah ka raha to main nahi suggest karunga ki main aage chala paunga kyunki ab wo to sahi baat hai.
Customer: Haan, kyunki agar mujhe isse koi benefit nahi hoga to mujhe chalane ka kya fayda hai?
Executive: Bilkul sahi baat hai but yahan pe ek kaam kar sakte hain sir ki jo aapka product line hai na ek baar category fir se cross check kar lunga category mujhe sab kuch sahi lag rahi hai. But isme main aapko bataun Narendra ji.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: IndiaMART apna sirf buyleads se business generate karke nahi deta hai direct inquiry bhi rehta hai suppose agar hum log hota buyleads par wo bhi nahi aa raha hai na baat ye hai ab main ek mahine mein teen teen inquiry aa rahi hai bataiye main kya kar lunga usse?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Bilkul sir direct call jo aapke paas aaye the chaar aaye the teen se chaar buyer ne aapko direct inquiry diya aapke product and profile ko dekh ke.
Customer: Matlab usme bhi koi matlab nahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul wo to bahut kam honge lekin aapne sir ek cheez dekha ki jo direct inquiry dekhiye buylead mein to main samajh raha hun ki buylead sabhi suppliers ke paas jaati hai aur wahan pe within minutes ke andar expire ho jati hai kabhi kabhi hume nahi milti hai. But jo direct inquiry hoti hai na wo depend karti hai visibility ke basis pe ki samne wala agar mera Delhi se koi bhi product search kar raha hai water chiller ya industrial chiller to kya meri company ki profile ko dekh pa raha hai ya nahi dekh pa raha hai sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To wo us pe depend karta hai to kabhi aapne check kiya hai ki jab Delhi se koi bhi buyer mera product ko search kar raha hai industrial water chiller ko to meri profile dikh rahi hai nahi dikh rahi kahan pe dikh rahi hai aapne kabhi dekha sir usko?
Customer: Nahi bahut niche dikhta hai kyunki ye hai hamara Mirzapur ka aur us pe aap log dal bhi rahe hain dale bhi hain ki Bahuar manufacturer in Bahuar. Bahuar koi janta hi nahi hai ultimate. Main kai baar bola ki ise change kariye lekin aap log ki taraf se kuch change hi nahi hota hai.
Executive: Lekin ek cheez aur bhi hai sir main aapko kuch supplier dikha sakta hun agar main water chiller industrial water chiller ki baat karu kaafi mahanga product hai aapka aur Delhi location jab apply karke dekh raha hun to bahar ki companies jaise ki Noida ki ek company hai Mangalam Techno Air Equipment Private Limited.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Dry cold system wala ho gaya ya Faridabad ki company hai aapka Desire Industrial karke Industrial.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aisi kuch companies na Delhi mein bhi top dikh rahi hai unki company ka bhi GST other state ya other city se hai. Surat ki company hai Satyam Cooling karke ye company Delhi mein top mein dikh rahi hai lekin sir Surat ki sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai to hum us tarike se plan kar sakte hain like that ki IndiaMART ka do part hota hai buylead hota hai aur dusra direct inquiry hota hai. Jo Surat ke client hogi Noida ke client hogi wo Delhi mein top mein dikh rahi hai ya fir Delhi wala supplier aapke shahar mein top mein dikh raha hai to un companies ki tarah agar hum log plan karte to maybe ho sakta hai ki direct inquiry ka flow automatically increase ho jayega.
Customer: Kaise un company ki taraf plan kar denge bataiye kariye kya karna hoga uske liye?
Executive: Nahi sir wo listing ka rehta hai ki suppose ab aapka jo plan chal raha hai TrustSeal wala isme hum log basically do part pe focus karte hain pehla cheez hota hai buylead ka wo aapki company ko provide karega jo bhi sir aayega most most try karenge aapki company ko de lekin direct inquiry ke liye na aapko aapki city wise promotion ki taraf nahi jab jab aap TrustSeal mein hi apne jo bole hain ki week mein 34 buylead milenge to agar aap TrustSeal mein hi nahi kar pa rahe hain to aage ka hum kya soch sakte hain?
Executive: Sir buylead mein 34 ka balance aapko hum jarur dete hain aur aapke product thoda aisa hai na ki aap khud samjhiye ki yahan pe har koi nahi aisa nahi hai abhi bahut jyada kharab ho gaya hai mamla iske pehle bhi to tha aisa nahi ki main abhi ka user hun ya main abhi se chala raha hun ya abhi se janta hun.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aap kitne saal se job kar rahe hain?
Executive: Main to pichle teen se chaar saal se hun is system mein.
Customer: Bataiye main kam se kam saat aath saal se IndiaMART use kar raha hun.
Executive: Ji ji aapka ek graph bhi dikh raha hai jahan pe April aur May ke andar lagbhag jo buylead conjunction tha kareeb kareeb 130 102 tha but recently month ke andar 80 82 is tarike ka average chala gaya 100 se kam ho gaya.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: 100 se kam nahi hai abhi to bahut kam hai matlab bahut jyada hi kam hai to aap log thoda sa kaam kariye abhi is pe aur ise kaise theek kar sakte hain abhi main GST bhi le raha hun Ghaziabad ka ki Delhi NCR mein main dikhu theek hai to us pe bhi kaam kariye aap log jab bhi call aata hai aap log turant plan bechne lagte hain aise thodi na hota hai ki main iske liye call kar raha hun aur aap lage sales karne.
Executive: Main sales ki matlab wo cheeze kuch bata rakha explain kar nahi nahi cheeze wahi batate hain aap log jahan se matlab kya hai ki plan ko bada kiya ja sakta hai problem ka solution kaise aa sakta hai us pe discuss hi nahi karte hain aap log. But agar aapko current plan ke andar man lo aapne ek saal ka pichla jo chalaya sir wahan pe aapko response mila hoga TrustSeal ka jo one year ka kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Pichle saal bilkul theek mila tha main keh to raha hun.
Customer: Hmm, lekin abhi kuch ekdam bekar hai.
Executive: Wapas aapne kiya tha May June mein kar diya tha theek hai to isme thoda sa gap ye bhi find out ho raha hai ki pichle mahine aap kahin pe busy schedule wagera tha kya buylead ka conjunction bhi kam dikha raha hai matlab ki thoda sa flow iska bhi kam hua hai.
Customer: Haan thoda sa tha lekin baat ye hai na ki abhi bilkul buylead abhi main free hun buylead aa hi nahi rahi hain main kaise purchase karu call ka dekhiye call to lagta hai mujhe kabhi kabhi galti se aa jata hai kisi ka theek hai aur direct inquiry bilkul hi nahi aati hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To in sab cheezon pe kaam kariye aap log pehle ise sudhariye fir aage ka plan dekhiye business kisi ka bhi chalega to koi bhi plan bada karega.
Executive: Main usi pe aa raha tha ki agar business conversion hum log achcha de payenge sir pehli cheez to hamara na sirf IndiaMART ek chhote se plan ke liye nahi hai ki do saal aapne kar liya fir yahan se chale no sir hum khud chahte hain ki aapki company hamare sath ek long time ke liye kaam kare to hum apni side se bhi efforts sakte hain ki jo bhi plan chala hai usme jitna bhi higher limitation hota hai uske basis pe aapko lead generate karke de sake.
Executive: Abhi ye kya hai ki Trade India Justdial wale bhi wahi keh rahe hain ab to mujhe unka theek lag raha hai kyunki unke mein koi limit nahi hai kam se kam ek baar quotation to sabko bhej sakta hai aadmi matlab koi bhi company sabko quotation bhej sakti hai.
Executive: Aap aap ye samjhiye sir dekhiye agar TrustSeal ke one year mein plan mein hum aapko bache se achcha diya to isme bhi achcha hi denge maybe ho sakta hai ki dusra reason ye sir market mein thoda sa down chal raha hoga ya fir achcha inquiry hai to hum ek baar ke liye cross check kar leta hun main apni side se.
Customer: Aisi baat nahi hai baki sab log ke paas aa rahi hai inquiry main dekh raha hun aur mere side pe nahi aa raha hai matlab kaam nahi ho raha hai abhi main dekha hun recently do teen mahine mein ek do manager change ho gaye hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Theek hai beech mein koi ladka hua tha fir ek girls hui thi fir fir change hoke koi aa gaya aisa bhi ho raha hai to pata nahi kya ho raha hai mujhe samajh nahi aa raha hai ki baar baar itni changes kyun ho rahi hain account manager.
Executive: Account account manager to system pe depend karta hai ki agar koi bhi banda agar hamare system mein nahi rehta hai to aapka account to hume kisi na kisi ko dena padta hai taki wo cheezon ko maintain karke rakhe.
Customer: Theek hai maintain karke rakhe.
Executive: Haan ek kaam kar leta hun Narendra ji isme main apni side se cross check kara leta hun aur Savita ko bhi inform kar deta hun agar usme kuch bhi find out hota hai correct karne ka wo correct kiya jaye aur apni side se hum log dekh lete hain hamari side se jo bhi correction karne ke liye hoga hum apni side se karke isko done karte hain aapka flow badh jayega sir ye wala.
Customer: Theek hai aap ise flow badhaiye plan ke bare mein hum log soch hi rahe hain main bhi plan kar raha hun ki bada kiya jaye wo samay aate hi apne aap ho jayega theek hai usme kehne wali koi baat hi nahi hai lekin abhi jo problem hai na usko resolve kiya jaye to jyada better hai.
Executive: Bilkul aap sir.
Customer: Haan, abhi inquiry ka thoda sa flow aap log badhaiye kisi bhi tarah koi bhi trick hai kuch bhi hai to use use kariye kuch agar mere side se kuch karna hai to mujhe bataiye main baith kar kar dunga system pe ek do ghante ke liye.
Customer: Theek hai, haan.
Executive: Aapka total 40 product dikh raha hai theek hai sir main apni side se jo bhi rehta hai na main isko done kar deta hun koi aur aur jaise koi but aap thoda sa isme ek cheez kariyega ki jo aapki side se lead conjunction gap aaya hai na pichle mahine ko usko wapas se improve karne ka try kariyega sir automatically thoda sa thoda sa bhi aapka conjunction kam hua hai.
Customer: Lead agar agar mein bhi aapka conjunction kam hua hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough buyleads.

- Customer is facing issues with TrustSeal.

- Customer is not getting direct inquiries.

- Customer wants to resolve current problems.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to cross-check the categories.

- Executive will inform Savita to correct any issues.

- Executive assured to improve lead conjunction.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, direct inquiry, categories
